item.title: Topic Modeling with LDA
item.description: Latent Dirichlet Allocation (LDA) is one of the most popular topic modeling techniques, even though the original paper has been published back in 2003. Topic modeling is a natural language processing technique that aims to automatically identify the underlying themes or topics in a collection of text documents. LDA produces two output a probability distribution on words to represent topics a probability distribution on topics to summarize documents So imagine you have the following set of sentences (a sentence is just a very short document):
